pkgmetadata.longdescription: ========Overview========Market Mix Modeling* Free software: GNU Lesser General Public License v3 or later (LGPLv3+)Installation============:: pip install mrktmixYou can also install the in-development version with:: pip install https://github.com/540pd/mrktmix/archive/master.zipDocumentation=============https://mrktmix.readthedocs.io/Development===========To run all the tests run:: toxNote, to combine the coverage data from all the tox environments run:.. list-table:: :widths: 10 90 :stub-columns: 1 - - Windows - :: set PYTEST_ADDOPTS=--cov-append tox - - Other - :: PYTEST_ADDOPTS=--cov-append toxChangelog=========0.0.1 (2020-09-06)------------------* First release on PyPI.
